Interface SessionService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SessionServiceImpl

    public interface SessionService
    Author:
    Zuzana

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createSessionLogin(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, String login)
      Creates an attribute login of session associated with request, containing passed login.
      void deleteSessionLogin(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Deletes the attribute login in current session
      String getSessionLogin(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Returns the login of currently logged in user.

    • Method Detail

      • createSessionLogin

        void createSessionLogin(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                        String login)
        Creates an attribute login of session associated with request, containing passed login.
        Parameters:
        request - request associated with this session
        login - value of login parameter to be set

      • getSessionLogin

        String getSessionLogin(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Returns the login of currently logged in user.
        Parameters:
        request - request associated with the session
        Returns:
        login of currently used user or null if no such exists

      • deleteSessionLogin

        void deleteSessionLogin(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Deletes the attribute login in current session
        Parameters:
        request - request associated with current session
